summary: The College of Winterhold was eerily quiet for my taste. This is just a very simple mod that allows music to play normally from within the College, (except Hall of Elements).
descriptionHtml:
The College of Winterhold was eerily quiet for my taste. This is just a very simple mod that allows music to play normally from within the College, (except Hall of Elements).

Music was activated in the following locations:

Arch-Mage Quarters
Hall of Attainment
Hall of Countenance
College Arcanaeum

Hall of Elements was not toggled purposefully.

This mod should be 100% compatible with all your favourite sound/audio mods.
Just to be sure of its activation, I would load it last of all audio mods.

Thanks!
author: spaneika
